about_the_game:
"Mom says: Friendeyes don't look sideways, so we don't worry overmuch..."

Two years ago the comms were cut to Kad, the shopping mall you grew up at. That's when the trains stopped running, too; nobody's heard anything from The City since then, and there haven't been any visitors either.

But it's ok-- sooner or later things will get back to normal. And Mom and Melia built a fence to keep everyone safe too, so now no-one else should disappear, too.

Remember To:

  • Have fun playing with Sokpop, your best friend.
  • Stay out of trouble.
  • Listen to your Mom.
  • Try to avoid Jorny, your older brother, who is SUCH a pain.
  • Be home in time for bed, and don't go out past the fence, OK?

Cellpop Goes Out At Night is The Real Texas - Part 2, Part 1.

Featuring all new music by yesso, a new world to explore, the freshest vibe to feel, and new thoughts to think about.
detailed_description:
Dusty Skies Edition Coming to Existing Owners

If you bought The Real Texas before the Steam release, as long as it wasn't in a PWYW bundle, you'll be upgraded to the Dusty Skies Edition for free. This means you probably don't need to buy the DLC if you already own the game somewhere else. :) It's my way of saying "Thank you" for supporting me!

It will take me a few days to arrange to get all the keys/etc. sent out, but please look forward to this!


About the Game

"Mom says: Friendeyes don't look sideways, so we don't worry overmuch..."

Two years ago the comms were cut to Kad, the shopping mall you grew up at. That's when the trains stopped running, too; nobody's heard anything from The City since then, and there haven't been any visitors either.

But it's ok-- sooner or later things will get back to normal. And Mom and Melia built a fence to keep everyone safe too, so now no-one else should disappear, too.

Remember To:

  • Have fun playing with Sokpop, your best friend.
  • Stay out of trouble.
  • Listen to your Mom.
  • Try to avoid Jorny, your older brother, who is SUCH a pain.
  • Be home in time for bed, and don't go out past the fence, OK?

Cellpop Goes Out At Night is The Real Texas - Part 2, Part 1.

Featuring all new music by yesso, a new world to explore, the freshest vibe to feel, and new thoughts to think about.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.14
  • Processor: Intel Core or better
  • Graphics: OpenGL 1.2 or better
  • Sound Card: ALSA or OSS compatible (uses SDL2)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.14
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: GeForce, RADEON, or Intel HD-series
  • Sound Card: ALSA or OSS compatible (uses SDL2)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Core or better
  • Graphics: OpenGL 1.2 or better
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: GeForce, RADEON, or Intel HD-series

short_description: Cellpop Goes Out At Night is an adventure rpg taking place at a shopping mall on the Planet of the Friendeyes.
